title: BUG: Champ select
body:
This....is so BLOODY dkjfsfadljvklcvxn AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH fustrating.

On different occasions, whether it would be myself or anther team member, this sort of thing would happen:
Chooses a champ ({{champion:17}} for example), changes to another one ({{champion:150}} for example), locks in {{champion:150}} but for some reason, the champ that actually gets locked in is {{champion:17}} .

I'm no brain surgeon or anything, but I believe it may be due to something with the server, almost as if the 'lock it' occurred  before the server 'notices' {{champion:150}} was even selected - I don't know :/

Just super frustrating when this happened to me in a ranked game, and happened to someone else during a 3v3. Is this just some dumb luck, or is it somewhat common with you guys?!

replies.body:
Don't insta-lock?

jk

For the moment, I'd say just select the champ you want first. Some people have been getting weird instances of lag, and that may be related.
